Get a {type} Egg for watching a quick video?
Get +{count} Gems for watching a quick video?
Click a booster below to find out more!
A short final rush to take down a few extra waves of Monsters!
Gain an elemental advantage against certain Bosses!
Emits a powerful magic laser, while making you invincible to damage!
Upon death, another one of your Guardians will continue the run!
Skip the first Boss and rush through 40 waves of Monsters!
Slows time for a few seconds, permanently reduces flight speed!
She never backs down from a challenge and is always first to the front lines of battle.
+{totalAbilityValue} more Bullet Upgrade Clovers from enemies
Renowned explorer, inventor, and scientist, she can find Ancient Eggs from any Boss!
+{totalAbilityValue} chance for Ancient Eggs from bosses
She was born in the wilds and raised by dragons. When dragons fly with her, they earn 2x XP!
+{totalAbilityValue} more Dragon XP earned from enemies
A master Alchemist and Mage of the Third Order, she earns 2x Coins. Cha-ching!
+{totalAbilityValue} more Coins earned from Arcade Games
Caretaker of the forest, a true sister to Nature. Her Aura of Magnetism increases item collection reach!
+{totalAbilityValue} Item collection reach (affects all drops from enemies)
A mysterious loner, with a dark and haunting past, some say she acts as if she has two lives...
+1 Extra Life, returns in Ghostform, deals +{totalAbilityValue} damage
An assassin who fears nothing! Attacks charge up her skill, which makes her invulnerable and deal 2x Shadow damage.
Charges up Shadowform, lasts {totalAbilityValue}, gains invinciblility and deals +100% damage
This sly illusionist has a few tricks up her sleeve. She can clone Dragons and harness their powers for unique spell combos.
Charges up Dragonspell, lasts {totalAbilityValue}, clones Dragons, casts spells from their Skills
Five-star General, formerly of the Royal EverWing Airforce, she now commands the five elements within her plasma cannons.
Deals up to +275% damage with elemental attacks, full charge lasts {totalAbilityValue}
A spunky warrior with a love of sweets, Trixie collects candy to rush through enemy waves and gain massive boosts in Raids.
Charges Candy Rush, deals +200% damage in Raids / rushes forward in Arcade Games, lasts {totalAbilityValue}
Imbued with the power of winter, Lucia pierces enemies with frozen daggers and freezes them mid-flight.
Ice bullets pierce enemies, charges Freezing Blast, freezes all enemies, lasts {totalAbilityValue}
A vengeful berserker! Attacks charge her bouncing axe, which deals 15x Nature DMG per second! Catch it to refill 50% charge.
Charges Runic Fang, bounces spinning axe, deals {totalAbilityValue}x Nature damage

An elite school for magical and physical combat, this structure allows your Guardians to hone their skills before battle, increasing their damage by {bonus}% in Clan Raids.
Be prepared! This blacksmith will equip your team with the latest and greatest, boosting their endurance in battle, adding +{bonus} second(s) to your Clan Raid Timer.
Increases default duration of Clan Raids.
A great place for blowing off steam after slaying monsters, this rowdy tavern boosts your team's morale, reducing the time it takes to regenerate Raid Energy by -{bonus} minute(s).
A home for Dragons, old and new, this structure rallies your winged friends before battle, increasing their damage by {bonus}% in Clan Raids.
There's nothing like a good night's sleep! This humble abode gives your Guardians a place to recover after battle, increasing your max regenerated Raid Energy by +{bonus}.
1 HOUR UNLIMITED ENERGY FOR ALL CLAN MEMBERS
Buy 1 hour of Energy Boost? This gives all clan members unlimited energy for the duration.
Wanna play again? Add EverWing to your Homescreen and get 5,000 Coins!
Thanks for creating a shortcut! You got 5,000 Coins!
Thanks for playing Unag.io! You got 5,000 Coins!

NEW RAID EVENT!
Free Jade from her nemesis, Spike!
After Spike was defeated, the Ice Queen kidnapped the mage Arcana, seeking to bring about the next Ice Age. Heroes, you must save Arcana before her magic is turned against the kingdom!

Defeat the Ice Queen to have a chance at unlocking
Arcana: Guardian of Magic
Arcana's power, "Dragonspell", is charged by collecting power stars. Once charged, activating her ability will clone both Dragons for 10 seconds. In addition, Arcana casts up to 4 spells based on the powers of the dragons cloned:
Dragonspell Shockwave Deal up to 35k dmg to all enemies
Dragonspell Timeslow Slow all of time for a moment
Dragonspell Gemfire Spawn valuable gems
Dragonspell Rush Rush forth, invincible for a moment
Event Treasure List:

Trailing the prismatic jetstreams comes EverWing's latest intruder: the cackling evil mastermind, Dr. Mekaniac! After capturing Lyra on his latest expedition, the power hungry villain has turned his sights toward the fairy capital. For a limited time, defeat him to free Lyra and add her to your team!

Lyra: Guardian of Might
Lyra can wield the power of the five elements by collecting Elemental Orbs, boosting her damage to extraordinary levels. Target your foe's elemental weakness and prove your prowess in battle!
Event Treasure List:
Halloween Boss costumes have arrived in the Boss Raid! For a short time, look out for special 'Spooky' Bosses for a spooktacular Raid experience!
Missed out on the great events this past year? No sweat. Here's another chance!

Magical Raid Chests or better contain Trixie, the Guardian of Mischief. This spunky Guardian collects candy in flight to power up massive damage and movement bonuses!
The limited time event Dragons are also returning. Platinum Raid Chests or better contain the Legendaries Ursus and Magnis, and Magical Raid Chests or better contain the Prismatic Mythic Pharis!

The lone daughter and once loyal subject to the Ice Queen, Lucia has decided to leave her past behind and join the forces of justice. But the price of freedom is steep, and she cannot do it alone!
LUCIA: Guardian of Frost Collects Frost Orbs to activate piercing Frost Shards, dealing 50% more damage to Bosses weak to Water. Fill her Power Bar to temporarily freezes all enemies and destroy all bullets.
Nikolas (NEW Raid Legendary Sidekick) +50% collection radius, +20% chance to find Clovers
Krampus (NEW Raid Legendary Sidekick) Attack Poisons (500% damage over 2s), +20% chance to find Mushrooms
For a limited time, rescue Lucia and her trusted Dragons from the Ice Queen's frozen clutches to add them to your league.

NEW RAID EVENT!
Summon Enamored Monster King or Queen to win Philomena and Baucisius
Set ability: Roses Are Red & Violets Are Blue Catch Heart Crystals to gain +15% Guardian Attack Speed!

NEW RAID EVENT!
Defeat Ancient Fluffy in Boss Raids to win Lacertis!
Set ability: Boss Killer and Fluffy Killer Deal +50% damage to all Bosses and +125% total damage to Fluffy!

Many years ago, Neve found a strange creature in the woods of her highland home. Initially shy and afraid, she won its trust with scraps of food and named it Fluffy. Every day, Fluffy ate. And it ate. And ate. And ate. Until one day, Neve returned home to find her home ransacked and her family missing. Convinced Fluffy was behind it all, she set off to hunt down her runaway pet, but it was nowhere to be found. As the years passed, her grief gave way to rage. And like Fluffy, it grew, and grew... until it consumed her.
Earn Platinum Raid Chests or better from Ancient Fluffy for your chance to win Neve!

NEW CLAN RAIDS!
Join a Clan to unlock Clan Raids. To join a Clan, open EverWing in that Clan's Official Messenger Group. Access may vary during beta, so ask your friends!
Thanks for playing!
A Tale of Fire and Ice

JOIN A CLAN TO UNLOCK:
YOUR OUTPOST
Each week, you can build a homebase to supercharge your team with powerful buffs. When the week ends, you'll earn Gems and exclusive Lazurian Eggs based on the total level of your Outpost buildings.
CRAFTING
Earn Clan Coins by crafting and selling powerful magic items. Craft a weapon and you can attack hordes of Monsters or their Outposts, and really bring home the bacon! Just drag and drop Elixir into the bubbling Cauldron to get started!
SHARDS OF LAZURIA
The Lazurian Dragons are exclusive to Clan Raids. These mage beasts have a powerful ability, called Deep Freeze. It freezes enemies, even bosses, for 2.5s (4s if weak to Water). When it shatters, it deals 10% of enemies' max HP as Water damage, max 50k (75k if weak to Water).
NEW RAID MAP AND BOSSES
According to an ancient legend, deep within the dormant volcano Mt. Lazur, the Mythic Dragon Lazuria sacrificed herself to seal away the flames of the powerful behemoth Firemaw. In what's now known as the Lazurian Caves, the Shards of Lazuria, a mysterious sect of powerful dragon mages, adorned in her icy crystal armor, have kept the flames at bay for millennia.
Two years ago, the Reckoning event, that shattered the Land of EverWing, sundered the frozen seal of Lazuria. Ever since that day, the monstrous and meteor-like fire birds have poured out from fissures and cracks, flinging flames through the skies of EverWing.
The Guardians of EverWing now set forth to those very caves, to uncover the truths of this ancient legend and to end the fires that have burned for far too long.
NEW CLAN RULES
In preparation for Clan vs Clan PvP and Global Leaderboards, we're making changes to how Clans work to create a fair battleground for everyone.
1. Raid Energy, Clan Coins, and Elixir are all tied to your current Clan. If you leave your Clan, you're leaving those items behind, so be sure to find a good group that you enjoy playing with!
2. If you leave a Clan and join a new one, you won't be able to participate in Clan Raids until the Weekly Reset.
3. You must be at least Level 10 to Create your own Clan.
4. Chest Damage Requirements have been lowered to allow more players to earn max rewards against the toughest bosses.
ON THE HORIZON
Is your Clan the best in the world? Soon, you'll know for sure. We're working on Global Clan Leaderboards, weekly Clan vs Clan competitions, and so much more!
<3 Thanks for playing EverWing!
Thanks! You got Lucia, 10 Polar Eggs, and 1225 Gems!
Thanks! You got Lyra, 10 Legendary Eggs, 50 Raid Energy, and 1000 Gems!
Thanks! You got Lily, Aurora, 5 Gold Eggs, and 500 Gems!
Thanks! You got twice the gems!
Thanks! You got $4.00 off your purchase price!
Magnanimous joins the battle! He's a great ally for the "On Shadow's Wings" event

He does extra damage to Spike, whose defeat will give a chance to unlock Jade
Here's the odds to get Magnanimous:
Urselius, and 5 other new dragons, have joined the battle!

Urselius's potent "Wildcard" magic enhances the innate abilities of these Guardians:
Aurora + Wildcard +50% Magnetic Reach
Lenore + Wildcard +50% Ghostform Damage
Jade + Wildcard +50% Shadow Form Duration
Arcana + Wildcard Enable all Dragonspells, +50% Spell Damage and Duration
Here are the odds to win Urselius:
At last, the final member is joining the battle! A legendary beast of immense power and might, he rises above the rest in skill and physique. Do you have what it takes to win his loyalty?

The Final Landing: The Beast of the East (July 31st, 2017)
Sarangay
A legendary warrior with powerful and impeccable aim. Fly with him to make enemies shatter before your eyes.
Here are the odds to win Sarangay:
Collect and evolve special Mek Dragons to unlock Prismaticus!

Prismatic Homing Attack Prismatic Power Shot +25% Treasure
Unbeknownst to the Guardians, reverberations of the Cataclysm has roused Prismaticus, a mythical mek dragon possessing immense elemental power. Concerned for his fairy allies, Prismaticus and his five epic Dragons - Stoke, Dew, Eve, Sparx, and Fetora - are hurtling toward EverWing, ready to fight...
In addition to other powers, each Mek Sidekick is armed with a Power Shot, fired into oncoming enemy waves to damage all enemies and meteors within its exploding range.
Here are the odds to win Stoke, Dew, Eve, Sparx, and Fetora:
Congratulations! You've obtained Prismaticus! Earn another one by hatching more mek dragons!
Progress applied on newly hatched or evolved dragons
Collect and evolve special dragons to unlock Sorceros!

NEW Collector's Sidekick: Sorceros the Mystic!
50% chance to find Coins & Treasure in Pumpkins Spread shot +40% Gems from Chests
It's time to go trick or treatin' with 6 brand new Halloween Dragons in this spooktacular Collector's event!
All Halloween Dragons have a special Trick or Treat ability, transforming monsters into pumpkins at random. Break the pumpkins to discover what's inside!
For a limited time, event Dragons can be found inside the exclusive Spooky Egg! Win and evolve all 5 event Dragons to add EverWing's first ever Shadow Collector's sidekick to your collection.
Here is how you can summon Sorceros:
Tier 1 Magi: 1x Scorch, 1x Icee, 1x Lumi, 1x Ven, 1x Cony Tier 2 Magus: 1x Magma, 1x Fria, 1x Lucerna, 1x Venum, 1x Chrysos Tier 3 Sorceros: 1x Vulcan, 1x Frigidus, 1x Lumina, 1x Venunarius, 1x Cornelius
Congratulations, your collection's complete! Refresh now to collect even more special dragons.
Progress applied on newly hatched or evolved dragons

Four outstanding dragons (Avi, Loreen, Coqi, and Lethio) have been deemed worthy by the High Council and permanently elevated to the rank of Mythic!
Along with new garb, these dragons have also been bestowed new powers. A new ally is also joining this upper echelon: the water dragon Kalla.

Any of these dragons collected previously retain their old rank and powers. The enhanced Mythic versions can be obtained from Eggs, including the new Ancient Egg.
For the duration of the event, enjoy a 25% higher hatch chance in Ancient Eggs for these amazing new Dragons. Don't miss it!
25% higher Drop Rate from Ancient Eggs
Collect and evolve special dragons to unlock Fortuna!

Fortuna, the winged goddess of fortune, is galloping into EverWing to join the festivities! Collect five steeds to summon this mesmerizing Mythic Sidekick!
Fortuna (Collector's Sidekick) Completes Quests 30% faster +50% damage to Bosses PRISMATIC Boss-seeking homing attack
Here is how to collect your very own Fortuna:
Tier 1 Pega: Ara, Po, Gigi, Som, Tia Tier 2 Peggie: Ares, Ponee, Gaea, Somnus, Theia Tier 3 Fortuna: Martius, Oceanus, Terra, Erebus, Eurypha
All Dragons in Fortuna's herd possess the champion ability, which yields +20% more Coins from Crystals and +25% more damage to Bosses and Loot Goblins!
Here are the odds to win these special event Dragons:
Congratulations, your collection's complete! Refresh now to collect even more special dragons.
Progress applied on newly hatched or evolved dragons
Happy Holidays from EverWing! We've brought back and buffed the popular and powerful Polar League Dragons!

Polar League Ability: Snow Cone Every 5 seconds, create a cone of sub-zero temperature that chills enemies, destroys meteors, and turns bullets into snowflakes upon contact.
~ Event Mythics ~ *Panzerbjorn the Polar Bear* Snow Cone / Chilling Breath / Boss Killer
*Theodore the Deer Mouse* Snow Cone / Amplify / Scavenger
~ Event Legendaries ~ *Blitzer the Reindeer* *Minerva the Snowy Owl* *Prancer the Bunny*
Polar League Hatch Chances:
Collect and evolve special Lunar Dragons to unlock Empeacocius
Lunar Beasts New Power: Fortune Upon clearing each wave, there's a 25% chance to drop a bonus Item.
Congratulations! You've obtained Empeacocius! Earn another one by hatching more lunar dragons!

The Great Mage's Familiars New Power: Spell Blast Every 6s, unleashes a powerful AoE blast of magical energy, dealing immense elemental damage, additionally eliminating any meteors or projectiles hit..
Congratulations! You've obtained Pixodus! Earn another one by hatching more mage's familiar eggs!

Primal Dragons\' mastery over the elements allows them to enhance their elemental powers, dealing two times the damage to those enemies with weakness to that dragon\'s element.
Congratulations! You've obtained Tiamat! Earn another one by hatching more primal dragon eggs!

These Loyal champion’s bring extra damage against mighty bosses and provide bonus gold from crystals.

These daring scallywags are peerless at looting gold and treasure.
Each of these fabled Egyptian sidekicks is imbued with magnetic magic, adding to your item and coin collection radius, in addition to other mystical powers.
Collect and evolve Spirit Festival Dragons.
Each of these sidekicks spawns Marigold Flowers that increases Guardian damage by 50% when collected.
These peerless warriors are armed with the formidable powershot skill.

Legend has it, he was the first monster. A nobleman seeking power, he broke the seal on an ancient, dark tomb. All that remains is the drive to spread monster kind far and wide.
No one, and no thing, is safe from the corruption of monsters. Mildred was the eldest tree in the Whispering Forest. Turned to darkness, she left her home with a new found hunger.
Fluffy's appetite is insatiable! Back home he subsisted on a steady diet of fungus cupcakes, candied slime, curdled blood pudding, and of course his new favorite: fairies!
Once an all powerful summoner, trained at EverWing Academy, the Monster Queen's thirst for power led her to make a pact with the King. She cannot be forgiven for her betrayal!
In a frozen cavern, deep in the Cloud Peak Mountains, monsters buried a dark gemstone, seeking to harness the elements. Years later, Spike the Ice Golem emerged.
Filled with an icy rage after the Guardians defeated her pet, Spike, the Ice Queen kidnapped Arcana to steal her powerful magic - planning the ultimate revenge on the warm-bloods.
